channel.title: How nerdy are you
channel.description:
[size=36pt]If you don't like this thread. Don't post on this thread. Simple As That.[/size]
This is basically a simple fast test to see how nerdy you are! So how this works is you just copy the form below and use stickethrough to the questions that best describe you!
Form 1- Play on the Computer 7+ hours a day. 2- Fluent in Java Scripting 3- Have a Online never met before girlfriend 4- Play lots of MMoRPG 5- Always wanted to be a Warlock 6- Is 20 or Older and is still a virgin 7- when you look at new computers like they were fast cars... 8- Cries when you loose a game or die in it. Such as loosing Chaotic in PvP 9- Sees more Computer Screen than Sunlight 10- When you hear a joke and start show your amusement by saying *rofl or lol*
____EXTRA____ For 6,7 if your under the age of these try these alternate choices!
6- When you didn't know what your boy/girlfriend looked like until he/she sent you a pic
7- When your daily to-do list looks like this:
#include <sleep.h>
int main() { get_up(); morning_pee(); for(int i=1; i==10) { snooze_bar(); } you_get_the_idea(); return 0; }
Here is mine! :)
Form 1- [s]Play on the Computer 7+ hours a day.[/s] 2- [s]Fluent in Java Scripting[/s] 3- Have a Online never met before girlfriend 4- Play lots of MMoRPG 5- Always wanted to be a Warlock 6- Is 20 or Older and is still a virgin 7- Older than 15 and still wear braces 8- [s]Cries when you loose a game or die in it. Such as loosing Chaotic in PvP[/s] 9- [s]Sees more Computer Screen than Sunlight[/s] 10- [s]When you hear a joke and start show your amusement by saying *rofl or lol*[/s]

item.title: How nerdy are you
item.dc:creator: @Diligo_Deum Diligo Deum
item.description:
@Diligo_Deum wrote:

1- Play on the Computer 7+ hours a day.
2- Fluent in Java Scripting
3- Have a Online never met before girlfriend
4- Play lots of MMoRPG
5- Always wanted to be a Warlock (don’t play WoW)
6- Is 20 or Older and is still a virgin (I’m 12)
7- when you look at new computers like they were fast cars…
8- Cries when you loose a game or die in it. Such as loosing Chaotic in PvP (Never had Chaotics lol)
9- Sees more Computer Screen than Sunlight
10- When you hear a joke and start show your amusement by saying rofl or lol

Read full topic
